pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" background="none" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="YrsYLkg3E1PAODW_LuyJ-5" value="Blocs en" parent="0" /> <mxCell <mxCell id="YrsYLkg3E1PAODW_LuyJ-7" value="<div><span style="font-size: 20px;">End-user interface&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div><div style="text-align: left;"><span style="font-size: 20px;"><br>&nbsp;&nbsp;<span style="font-weight: normal;">- Ergonomic&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div><div style="text-align: left;"><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal;">&nbsp; - Accessible&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div><div style="text-align: left;"><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal;">&nbsp; - Reacting</span></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="5" width="424" height="240" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YrsYLkg3E1PAODW_LuyJ-8" value="<font style="font-size: 18px;"><b style="">Frontend</b></font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="7dwxjCEdm_Womgq4vl4O-105" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="10" width="136" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7dwxjCEdm_Womgq4vl4O-106" value="" style="group" parent="YrsYLkg3E1PAODW_LuyJ-5" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="-746" y="851" width="421" height="240" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7dwxjCEdm_Womgq4vl4O-107" value="<div><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: 400;"><br>- Configuration&nbsp;<br>&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: 400; background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">- ePortfolio API</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: 400;">&nbsp;</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: 400;">- Administration API</span></div>" style="shape=folder;fontStyle=1;spacingTop=10;tabWidth=171;tabHeight=45;tabPosition=left;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;shadow=1;align=left;spacingLeft=20;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" parent="7dwxjCEdm_Womgq4vl4O-106" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="4.906759906759907" width="416.09324009324007" height="240" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7dwxjCEdm_Womgq4vl4O-108" value="<font style="font-size: 18px;"><b style="">Back-office</b></font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="7dwxjCEdm_Womgq4vl4O-106" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="6" y="10" width="133.46386946386946" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7dwxjCEdm_Womgq4vl4O-109" value="" style="group" parent="YrsYLkg3E1PAODW_LuyJ-5" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="42" y="1204" width="421" height="240" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7dwxjCEdm_Womgq4vl4O-110" value="<div style=""><span style="font-size: 20px;"><br><br>&nbsp;Enhanced security&nbsp;<br>&nbsp;</span></div><div style=""><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal;">&nbsp; - Isolated from the user interface (frontend)&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div><div style=""><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal;">&nbsp; - Multi-factor authentication&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div><div style=""><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal;">&nbsp; - Network restrictions&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div><div style=""><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal;">&nbsp; - etc.</span></div>" style="shape=folder;fontStyle=1;spacingTop=10;tabWidth=171;tabHeight=45;tabPosition=left;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;shadow=1;align=left;spacingLeft=20;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" parent="7dwxjCEdm_Womgq4vl4O-109" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="4.906759906759907" width="416.09324009324007" height="240" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7dwxjCEdm_Womgq4vl4O-111" value="<span style="font-size: 18px;"><b>Administration UI</b></span>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="7dwxjCEdm_Womgq4vl4O-109" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="10" width="177" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7dwxjCEdm_Womgq4vl4O-114" value="" style="group" parent="YrsYLkg3E1PAODW_LuyJ-5" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="723" y="871" width="421" height="240" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7dwxjCEdm_Womgq4vl4O-115" value="<div style=""><span style="font-size: 20px;"><br><br>&nbsp;<br>Several storage systems&nbsp;&nbsp;<br><br></span></div><div style=""><span style="font-size: 20px;">&nbsp; - <span style="font-weight: normal;">Versioned (logs, assessments, etc.)<br></span></span><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal; background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">&nbsp; - Relational (for other modules)&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 20px;"><span style="font-weight: normal;"></span></span></div><div style=""><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal;">&nbsp;- Cache / lightweight files&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div><div style=""><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal;"><br></span></div><div style=""><br></div>" style="shape=folder;fontStyle=1;spacingTop=10;tabWidth=171;tabHeight=45;tabPosition=left;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;shadow=1;align=left;spacingLeft=20;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" style="font-size: 18px;"><b style="">Data Storage</b></font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="7dwxjCEdm_Womgq4vl4O-114" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="10" width="133.46386946386946" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7dwxjCEdm_Womgq4vl4O-118" value="" style="group" parent="YrsYLkg3E1PAODW_LuyJ-5" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="699" y="478" width="429" height="240" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7dwxjCEdm_Womgq4vl4O-119" value="<div style=""><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 20px;"><br><br><br>Information Systems Integration<br></span><span style="font-size: 20px;">&nbsp;</span></div><div style="text-align: left;"><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal;">&nbsp; - Provisioning&nbsp;&nbsp;<br></span><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal; background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">&nbsp; - Import, export&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal;"></span></div><div style="text-align: left;"><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal; background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">&nbsp; - Third-party services</span></div><div style="text-align: left; font-size: 20px;"><br></div>" 20px;">Usage</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal;">- Usage statistics</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal;">- Learning analytics</span></div><div><br></div></div>" </mxCell> <mxCell id="kjjOAoAnyoO9AeWgtHKF-3" value="<div><br></div>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;spacingTop=8;spacingLeft=2;spacingRight=12;shape=cube;size=10;direction=south;fontStyle=4;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;backgroundColor=red;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;" style="font-size: 20px;">API Manager<br></b><br><div style=""><div style="text-align: left;"><font style="font-size: 20px;"><br><br>Single entry point for all API calls&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></div><div style="text-align: left;"><font style="font-size: 20px;"><br>Centralizes, streamlines, and secures all communication between frontend and backend&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></div><div style="text-align: left;"><font style="font-size: 20px;"><br>Includes many features for operational continuity</font></div><div style="text-align: left;"><font style="font-size: 20px;"><br></font></div></div></font><div
